title: SOLD: Tinker - Bat On - poor condition, nice eye appeal
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: SOLD: Tinker - Bat On - poor condition, nice eye appeal
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is the following T206 of HOFer Joe Tinker.  It has a Piedmont 350-460 back with some light pencil writing on the bottom right of the back.  The top and bottom edges are a little jagged and there is a diagonal crease across Tinker's face.  Not a bad looking (technically poor/authentic condition) card.

Please email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.

Shipping on me.  Looking for [Strike]$XX[/Strike] [STRIKE]$XX[/STRIKE] $XX via paypal f/f.

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1911%20T206%20Tinker.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1911%20T206%20Tinker%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]

another bump, another price reduction.

and...SOLD!
